tools.detailed_description: A geometric multigrid solver implemented in MATLAB for large-scale static finite element simulations on 3D Cartesian meshes.

tools.name: Percept
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel mesh refinement and adaptivity tools
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for parallel mesh refinement and adaptivity, designed to support finite element methods and large-scale simulations.

tools.name: FinEtoolsVoxelMesher.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Voxel meshing tool for medical images in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for generating finite element meshes from voxel data, specifically targeted at medical imaging applications.

tools.name: MeshCore.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured mesh manipulation library for FEM in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A core library for the curation, manipulation, and management of general unstructured meshes, serving as a foundation for Finite Element Method applications in Julia.

tools.name: ComfyUI-GeometryPack
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry processing nodes for ComfyUI
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for ComfyUI that exposes scientific geometry processing libraries (like libigl and CGAL) as nodes, enabling visual workflows for 3D geometry manipulation.

tools.name: Athena++
tools.one_line_profile: Radiation GRMHD code with adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: A complete astrophysical magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) code featuring adaptive mesh refinement (AMR), designed for simulating radiation GRMHD phenomena.

tools.name: PyMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid prototyping geometry processing library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a set of common mesh processing operations and interfaces to various C++ geometry processing libraries, facilitating rapid prototyping.

tools.name: ConstrainedDelaunayTriangulation
tools.one_line_profile: C# library for constrained Delaunay triangulation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the Delaunay triangulation algorithm that supports constrained edges, useful for mesh generation and computational geometry tasks.

tools.name: Netgen LVS
tools.one_line_profile: Layout vs Schematic (LVS) verification tool for VLSI
tools.detailed_description: A tool for comparing netlists (e.g., SPICE vs Verilog), primarily used in Electronic Design Automation (EDA) for Layout vs Schematic verification. (Note: Distinct from the Netgen Mesher).

tools.name: DelaunayVoronoi
tools.one_line_profile: Delaunay triangulation and Voronoi diagram library in C#
tools.detailed_description: A C# implementation of the Bowyer–Watson algorithm for generating Delaunay triangulations and Voronoi diagrams, suitable for 2D mesh generation.

tools.name: PolyFatigueCrackSim
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow scripts for polycrystalline fatigue crack simulation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts automating the generation of polycrystalline RVE models and finite element analysis for fatigue crack simulation, integrating Neper, Gmsh, and Abaqus.

tools.name: SCOREC Core
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel unstructured mesh infrastructure
tools.detailed_description: A set of C++ libraries for managing distributed unstructured meshes, supporting parallel adaptive finite element simulations.

tools.name: SIMO-Package
tools.one_line_profile: NURBS-based IsoGeometric Analysis (IGA) package
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB package implementing NURBS-based IsoGeometric Analysis (IGA) for educational and research purposes in computational mechanics.

tools.name: SLIDE
tools.one_line_profile: Controllable point cloud and mesh generation model
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating controllable 3D point clouds and meshes, enabling text-driven or parameter-driven 3D content creation.

tools.name: ADHMR
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion-based human mesh recovery model
tools.detailed_description: An AI model for recovering human meshes from images using diffusion models aligned via Direct Preference Optimization (DPO).

tools.name: blastAMR
tools.one_line_profile: Load-balanced AMR libraries for OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A library providing load-balanced Adaptive Mesh Refinement (AMR) capabilities for ESI OpenFOAM, originally ported from blastFoam.

tools.name: SALOME
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source platform for numerical simulation
tools.detailed_description: The main repository/profile for the SALOME platform, an open-source integration platform for numerical simulation, providing a generic environment for pre-processing, solving, and post-processing.

tools.name: SALOME GEOM
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry module for SALOME platform
tools.detailed_description: The geometry (GEOM) module of the SALOME platform, providing CAD modeling services and geometric operations required for simulation pre-processing.

tools.name: SALOME KERNEL
tools.one_line_profile: Core infrastructure for SALOME simulation platform
tools.detailed_description: The KERNEL module of SALOME, implementing general services such as module management, distributed object communication (CORBA), and study management for the simulation platform.

tools.name: SALOME SHAPER
tools.one_line_profile: Parametric CAD modeling module for SALOME
tools.detailed_description: The SHAPER module for SALOME, providing advanced parametric and variational geometric modeling capabilities for creating simulation-ready geometries.

tools.name: SALOME SMESH
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh generation and editing module for SALOME
tools.detailed_description: The SMESH module for SALOME, enabling the generation, editing, and export of complex meshes for numerical simulation, supporting various meshing algorithms.

tools.name: Constrained_Delaunay_Triangulation
tools.one_line_profile: C# implementation of Constrained Delaunay Triangulation (CDT) for surface domains
tools.detailed_description: A C# library that implements the Constrained Delaunay Triangulation algorithm, allowing for the generation of triangular meshes on surface domains with specific constraints. Useful for computational geometry and mesh generation tasks.

tools.name: PaMO
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel Mesh Optimization for Intersection-Free Low-Poly Modeling on the GPU
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the PG2025 paper 'PaMO'. It provides a GPU-accelerated tool for optimizing meshes to be intersection-free, specifically targeting low-poly modeling scenarios in geometry processing.

tools.name: SciBlend
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced Data Visualization Workflows within Blender for scientific data
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool that integrates scientific data visualization workflows into Blender. It allows researchers to import, process, and render complex scientific datasets using Blender's advanced rendering capabilities.

tools.name: Salome_Plugins
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scripts and plugins for the Salome FEA/CFD platform
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts and plugins designed to extend the functionality of the Salome platform, which is widely used for pre-processing (meshing) and post-processing in numerical simulations (FEA/CFD).

tools.name: CGALDotNet
tools.one_line_profile: C# wrapper for the Computational Geometry Algorithms Library (CGAL)
tools.detailed_description: A C# wrapper for CGAL, one of the most comprehensive libraries for computational geometry. It enables .NET developers to access CGAL's robust algorithms for triangulation, voronoi diagrams, and mesh processing.

tools.name: meshletmaker
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of algorithms for generating meshlets from 3D meshes
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library implementing algorithms to decompose 3D meshes into meshlets (small clusters of triangles). While often used for rendering, this geometry processing task is relevant for mesh optimization and parallel processing in simulations.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab program for 2D fracture problems using Extended Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab-based solver for simulating arbitrary multiple crack propagations in 2D linear-elastic solids. It uses XFEM to model discontinuities and includes features for crack growth criteria and mesh handling.

tools.name: OCT-MPS
tools.one_line_profile: Massively Parallel Simulator for Optical Coherence Tomography
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-accelerated simulator for Optical Coherence Tomography (OCT). It models the physics of light interaction with tissue to simulate OCT imaging, serving as a tool for biomedical optics research.

tools.name: DPO Cook
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Model, Geometry, and Texture Processing Server
tools.detailed_description: Developed by the Smithsonian Digitization Program Office, this tool acts as a processing server for 3D data. It handles geometry processing, texture management, and file conversion, facilitating the pipeline for scientific and cultural heritage 3D digitization.

tools.name: Assimp.Net
tools.one_line_profile: .NET wrapper for the Open Asset Import Library (Assimp)
tools.detailed_description: A C# wrapper for Assimp, a standard library for importing and exporting various 3D model formats. It is essential for pre-processing pipelines that need to handle diverse geometry data formats in scientific visualization or simulation tools.

tools.name: spade
tools.one_line_profile: Delaunay Triangulation library for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A robust Rust library for performing Delaunay triangulations and related geometric operations. It serves as a foundational tool for mesh generation and computational geometry in the Rust ecosystem.

tools.name: PySetVoronoi
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Set Voronoi Tessellation
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides a Python interface to C++ implementations for computing Set Voronoi Tessellations. This is a specific geometric partitioning method useful in material science and granular mechanics.

tools.name: bpt
tools.one_line_profile: Scaling Mesh Generation via Compressive Tokenization
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the CVPR'25 paper. It is an AI-based tool for efficient and scalable 3D mesh generation using compressive tokenization techniques, relevant for AI4S geometry reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: InstantMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient 3D Mesh Generation from a Single Image
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art AI tool for generating high-quality 3D meshes from single images using sparse-view large reconstruction models. It automates the geometry creation process for scientific visualization and modeling.

tools.name: TetGen
tools.one_line_profile: Quality Tetrahedral Mesh Generator and 3D Delaunay Triangulator
tools.detailed_description: A mirror of the famous TetGen software, a robust tool for generating tetrahedral meshes and 3D Delaunay triangulations. It is a standard component in many finite element analysis and scientific computing pipelines.

tools.name: OpenLane
tools.one_line_profile: Automated RTL to GDSII flow for ASIC design
tools.detailed_description: An automated flow for digital ASIC implementation. While primarily for chip design (EDA), it integrates multiple scientific solvers (OpenROAD, Yosys) for physical simulation, optimization, and layout, serving as a critical engineering research tool.

tools.name: AtlasNet
tools.one_line_profile: Learning 3D Surface Generation from point clouds or images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for generating 3D surfaces (meshes) from low-resolution point clouds or images. It uses a patch-based approach to reconstruct high-quality geometry, useful for scientific data reconstruction.

tools.name: sdf_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for building and manipulating Signed Distance Fields (SDFs)
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating and compressing Signed Distance Fields (SDFs) from various inputs like images, point clouds, and Octomaps. SDFs are critical for collision checking, path planning, and physics simulations.

tools.name: SdfLib
tools.one_line_profile: Library for accelerating Signed Distance Field queries from triangle meshes
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed to compute and query Signed Distance Fields (SDFs) from triangle meshes efficiently. It is useful for applications requiring fast distance computations in geometry processing and simulation.

tools.name: Voxfield
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Projective Signed Distance Fields for Online Planning and Reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building Signed Distance Fields (SDFs) suitable for online planning and 3D reconstruction. It addresses limitations of projective SDFs, making it valuable for robotics and dynamic environment modeling.

tools.name: OpenRAM
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Static Random Access Memory (SRAM) compiler
tools.detailed_description: A compiler that generates SRAM designs (circuits, layout, timing models) from specifications. It is a critical tool in VLSI research and engineering, automating the creation of memory structures for chip design.

tools.name: TopologyOptimizationToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Structural Topology Optimization in Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab toolbox for performing 3D structural topology optimization using unstructured meshes. It provides a set of tools for researchers and engineers to optimize material distribution in structures.

tools.name: SimplexGridFactory.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface to Triangulate.jl and TetGen.jl for unstructured grid generation
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing convenience interfaces to Triangulate.jl and TetGen.jl, facilitating the generation of simplex grids (triangles in 2D, tetrahedra in 3D) for partial differential equation solvers.

tools.name: DreamMesh4D
tools.one_line_profile: Video-to-4D generation framework using Gaussian-Mesh hybrid representation
tools.detailed_description: A research tool from NeurIPS 2024 for generating 4D meshes from video inputs. It utilizes a sparse-controlled Gaussian-Mesh hybrid representation to achieve high-quality dynamic 3D reconstruction.

tools.name: ABAQUS_UMAT_316ss_Zr4
tools.one_line_profile: Unified elasto-viscoplastic constitutive models (UMAT) for 316 stainless steel and Zircaloy-4
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Abaqus UMAT subroutines and INP files implementing unified elasto-viscoplastic constitutive models specifically calibrated for 316 stainless steel and Zircaloy-4 materials.

tools.name: Bloch Wave Analysis for Metamaterials
tools.one_line_profile: Abaqus and Python implementation for calculating band gaps of nonlinear mechanical metamaterials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing Bloch wave analysis to calculate band gaps in mechanical metamaterials. It handles material and geometric nonlinearities and implements complex-valued boundary conditions within commercial FEA software.

tools.name: CGAL_IN_GRASSHOPPER
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper enabling CGAL geometry algorithms within Rhino/Grasshopper
tools.detailed_description: A C# wrapper that exposes the Computational Geometry Algorithms Library (CGAL) functionalities to the Grasshopper visual programming environment, enabling advanced scientific geometry processing in CAD workflows.

tools.name: MeshMosaic
tools.one_line_profile: AI tool for scaling artist mesh generation via local-to-global assembly
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the MeshMosaic paper, providing a method to generate large-scale 3D meshes by assembling local geometries, aimed at automating and scaling 3D content creation.

tools.name: SDFDiff
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable rendering of Signed Distance Fields for 3D shape optimization
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable rendering framework that operates on Signed Distance Fields (SDF), enabling gradient-based 3D shape optimization and reconstruction from images.

tools.name: ASIGA
tools.one_line_profile: Acoustic Scattering simulation using Isogeometric Analysis (IGA)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB software package for simulating acoustic scattering problems using Isogeometric Analysis, providing tools for numerical analysis of wave propagation.

tools.name: delaunator-cpp
tools.one_line_profile: Fast C++ library for 2D Delaunay triangulation
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ library for computing 2D Delaunay triangulations of point sets, widely used in computational geometry and meshing applications.

tools.name: NN_aniso_UMAT
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based hyperelastic constitutive model (UMAT) for anisotropic materials
tools.detailed_description: A framework implementing neural network-based hyperelastic constitutive models for anisotropic materials, including Abaqus UMAT subroutines for finite element analysis.

tools.name: CDT-plusplus
tools.one_line_profile: Causal Dynamical Triangulations simulation library using CGAL
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for performing Causal Dynamical Triangulations (CDT) simulations, a background-independent approach to quantum gravity, utilizing CGAL for geometric operations.

tools.name: adaptive-mesh-refinement
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB algorithm for adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of adaptive mesh refinement (AMR) algorithms, designed to refine meshes based on error estimates for finite element analysis.

tools.name: Lagrange
tools.one_line_profile: Robust geometry processing library by Adobe
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library for robust geometry processing, offering functionalities for mesh boolean operations, cleaning, and refinement, designed for high reliability in geometric computing.

tools.name: gmshparser
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python parser for Gmsh .msh files
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Python package for parsing Gmsh ASCII mesh files (.msh), designed to be easily integrated into FEM research codes without external dependencies.

tools.name: gptoolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive MATLAB toolbox for geometry processing
tools.detailed_description: A widely used MATLAB toolbox for geometry processing, containing a vast collection of functions for mesh editing, deformation, parameterization, and other geometric algorithms.

tools.name: SketchyCGAL
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB implementation of Scalable Semidefinite Programming
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool implementing Scalable Semidefinite Programming (SDP) algorithms, often used in geometry processing and optimization tasks.

tools.name: HOISDF
tools.one_line_profile: Hand-Object Pose Estimation using Global Signed Distance Fields
tools.detailed_description: A research tool for 3D hand-object pose estimation that utilizes global Signed Distance Fields (SDF) to constrain and improve the geometric consistency of the reconstruction.

tools.name: MPI-AMRVAC
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel adaptive mesh refinement framework for astrophysics and plasma physics
tools.detailed_description: A robust, parallel framework for solving partial differential equations using adaptive mesh refinement (AMR), primarily targeted at astrophysics and plasma physics simulations.

tools.name: CDT
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Constrained Delaunay Triangulation library in C++
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for generating Constrained Delaunay Triangulations (CDT), a fundamental algorithm for 2D mesh generation in finite element analysis and computational geometry.

tools.name: PythonCDT
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for the CDT C++ library
tools.detailed_description: Provides Python bindings for the CDT library, enabling Constrained Delaunay Triangulation within Python-based scientific workflows.

tools.name: ameshref
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient MATLAB implementation of adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for 2D adaptive mesh refinement (AMR), essential for improving solution accuracy in finite element method (FEM) simulations by locally refining the mesh.

tools.name: Drag3D
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive mesh generation and editing using generative AI
tools.detailed_description: Combines DragGAN and GET3D to allow for interactive, AI-driven generation and manipulation of 3D meshes, applicable in geometric modeling and synthetic data generation.

tools.name: nerf2mesh
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality mesh recovery from NeRF representations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting delicate textured meshes from Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) using adaptive surface refinement, bridging implicit neural representations and explicit mesh formats.

tools.name: gDel3D
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated 3D Delaunay triangulation library
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance library for computing 3D Delaunay triangulations on the GPU, designed for massive parallelism in scientific computing and geometry processing.

tools.name: gStar4D
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-based 4D Delaunay triangulation solver
tools.detailed_description: Computes Delaunay triangulations in 4D space using GPU acceleration, useful for space-time meshing or higher-dimensional geometric analysis.

tools.name: MeshIO (CloudCompare Plugin)
tools.one_line_profile: CloudCompare plugin for extended 3D model format support
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the CloudCompare software that enables loading of COLLADA, glTF, and IFC-SPF 3D models, facilitating interoperability in point cloud and mesh processing workflows.

tools.name: neuro-voxel
tools.one_line_profile: Volumetric MRI visualization and mesh generation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for analyzing BraTS datasets that converts NIfTI MRI slices into 3D meshes using the Marching Cubes algorithm, enabling volumetric visualization and tumor volume calculation.

tools.name: MeshGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Generative transformer for 3D triangle meshes
tools.detailed_description: An autoregressive transformer model capable of generating high-quality triangle meshes, representing a data-driven approach to geometry synthesis and mesh generation.

tools.name: Directional
tools.one_line_profile: Library for directional field synthesis and processing on meshes
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library focused on the synthesis, design, and processing of directional fields on 3D meshes, which is critical for tasks like quad-meshing and texture mapping.

tools.name: diff3d
tools.one_line_profile: Visual diff tool for 3D mesh and CAD files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to visually compare 3D models (STL, OBJ, STEP, etc.), useful for quality control and versioning of geometry in engineering workflows.

tools.name: rvesimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Automated RVE simulator for material constitutive law discovery
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that automates Representative Volume Element (RVE) simulations using Abaqus to generate data for discovering material constitutive laws.

tools.name: PyDistMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Simple mesh generator for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the DistMesh algorithm for generating unstructured triangular meshes, suitable for simple domains and quick prototyping.

tools.name: geovista
tools.one_line_profile: Cartographic rendering and mesh analytics for geo-science
tools.detailed_description: Extends PyVista for cartographic projections and mesh analysis, specifically tailored for handling and visualizing unstructured grids in the earth sciences.

tools.name: delaunay-triangulation
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of Delaunay triangulation
tools.detailed_description: A standalone C++ library for performing Delaunay triangulation, a core operation for mesh generation in computational physics and engineering.

tools.name: Isogeometric-BEM
tools.one_line_profile: Isogeometric Boundary Element Analysis in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB codebase for performing Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) using the Boundary Element Method (BEM), integrating CAD geometry directly into the analysis process.

tools.name: Restore_3d_model
tools.one_line_profile: Shape-from-Silhouette with texture-based mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: A tool for reconstructing 3D mesh models from multiple 2D images using Shape-from-Silhouette techniques and texture-based refinement.

tools.name: MeshAnything
tools.one_line_profile: Artist-Created Mesh Generation with Autoregressive Transformers
tools.detailed_description: An AI model that generates high-quality, artist-topology meshes from various inputs, leveraging autoregressive transformers to produce clean geometry suitable for simulation and rendering.

tools.name: MeshAnythingV2
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced autoregressive mesh generation with adjacent tokenization
tools.detailed_description: The second version of MeshAnything, improving mesh generation quality and consistency through adjacent mesh tokenization techniques.

tools.name: pyiga
tools.one_line_profile: Python research toolbox for Isogeometric Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A research toolbox for Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) in Python, facilitating the study and implementation of IGA methods which integrate CAD geometry with finite element analysis.

tools.name: gmsh2ccx
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Gmsh mesh format to CalculiX input format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert meshes generated by Gmsh (.msh) into the input format required by the CalculiX (.inp) finite element solver, bridging the gap between pre-processing and solving.

tools.name: pygccx
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for CalculiX FEA workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework that orchestrates the finite element analysis workflow, including building models, solving with CalculiX, and post-processing, often utilizing Gmsh for meshing.

tools.name: unv2ccx
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from Salome UNV mesh to CalculiX INP format
tools.detailed_description: A tool to convert Universal (UNV) mesh files, typically exported from Salome, into the CalculiX input format, enabling the use of Salome as a pre-processor for CalculiX.

tools.name: voxelized_geometry_tools
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for voxel-based geometry processing and signed distance fields
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for working with voxelized geometry, including voxel-based collision/occupancy maps, signed-distance fields (SDF), and discrete geometry utilities. Useful for physics simulations requiring volumetric representation of geometry.

tools.name: IGAPack
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB library for Isogeometric Analysis with hierarchical refinements
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) methods, specifically focusing on hierarchical refinements. It provides tools for numerical analysis using spline-based basis functions, suitable for engineering simulation and structural analysis.

tools.name: isogeometric-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB code for Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) and FEM
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) and Finite Element Method (FEM) algorithms. It serves as a codebase for solving partial differential equations using spline-based geometries.

tools.name: rodin
tools.one_line_profile: Modern C++20 framework for finite element method and shape optimization
tools.detailed_description: A modern C++20 framework designed for finite element analysis (FEM) and shape optimization. It leverages recent C++ features for efficient mesh handling and numerical solving in engineering applications.

tools.name: openMVS
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Multi-View Stereo reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A library for Multi-View Stereo (MVS) reconstruction, capable of recovering full 3D models from images. It includes algorithms for dense point cloud reconstruction, mesh generation, mesh refinement, and texturing, widely used in geoscience and engineering reverse engineering.

tools.name: GMSH-Airfoil-2D
tools.one_line_profile: Python tool to generate 2D meshes around airfoils using Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based utility that interfaces with Gmsh to generate structured or unstructured 2D meshes around airfoil geometries. It automates the pre-processing step for aerodynamic CFD simulations.

tools.name: cg3lib
tools.one_line_profile: C++ geometry processing library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for geometry processing, providing data structures and algorithms for handling 2D and 3D geometric objects, meshes, and spatial queries.

tools.name: sdftoolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Signed Distance Fields manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A vectorized Python library for creating, manipulating, and tessellating Signed Distance Fields (SDFs). It supports generating SDFs from meshes and converting SDFs back to meshes, useful for physics simulations and geometry modeling.

tools.name: pyMeSHSim
tools.one_line_profile: Library for calculating MeSH (Medical Subject Headings) similarity
tools.detailed_description: A Python module to calculate semantic similarity between Medical Subject Headings (MeSH) terms. While the name contains 'MeSH', it refers to biomedical ontology terms, not geometric meshes. It is a scientific tool for bioinformatics/text mining.

tools.name: mesh-sphere-packing
tools.one_line_profile: Tetrahedral mesh generator from sphere packings
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating tetrahedral meshes with periodic boundaries based on sphere packings. This is particularly useful for simulating porous media, granular materials, or microstructures in materials science.

tools.name: SDFGen
tools.one_line_profile: Commandline utility to generate grid-based signed distance fields
tools.detailed_description: A simple but widely used command-line utility to generate grid-based signed distance fields (level sets) from triangle meshes. It is a standard tool in physics-based animation and fluid simulation pipelines.

tools.name: CADMesh
tools.one_line_profile: CAD file interface for GEANT4
tools.detailed_description: A library that allows importing CAD models (STL, PLY, OBJ, etc.) directly into GEANT4 geometry. GEANT4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles through matter, widely used in high energy physics and medical physics.

tools.name: PyMeshLab
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for MeshLab
tools.detailed_description: The official Python library for MeshLab, enabling automated mesh processing scripts. It provides a wide range of mesh cleaning, simplification, and conversion filters used in scientific visualization and geometry processing.

tools.name: MeshLab
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced system for processing and editing 3D triangular meshes
tools.detailed_description: An open-source system for processing and editing 3D triangular meshes. It provides a set of tools for editing, cleaning, healing, inspecting, rendering, and converting meshes, widely used in research for 3D scanning and geometry processing.

tools.name: VCGlib
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for manipulation and processing of triangle meshes
tools.detailed_description: The Visualization and Computer Graphics Library (VCGlib) is a C++ template library for manipulation, processing, and cleaning of triangle meshes. It is the core library powering MeshLab.

tools.name: salome_cfd_extensions
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for the SALOME platform for CFD
tools.detailed_description: Modules and extensions for the SALOME platform specifically tailored for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), developed in the context of Code_Saturne. It enhances SALOME's capabilities for mesh generation and case setup for CFD simulations.

tools.name: compas_cgal
tools.one_line_profile: COMPAS package for working with CGAL
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper package that provides an interface between the COMPAS framework (for computational research in architecture and structures) and CGAL (Computational Geometry Algorithms Library), enabling advanced mesh boolean operations and triangulation.

tools.name: pcdmeshing
tools.one_line_profile: Point cloud meshing tool using CGAL
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating meshes from point clouds using CGAL's reconstruction algorithms. It is useful for converting raw scan data into usable mesh geometry for simulation or visualization.

tools.name: tessagon
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for tessellating 2D manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to tessellate 2D manifolds with various patterns (triangles, hexagons, etc.). It is useful for generating structured meshes on surfaces for simulation or architectural geometry.

tools.name: PetIGA
tools.one_line_profile: PETSc-based framework for Isogeometric Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance framework for Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) built on top of PETSc. It provides the necessary data structures and solvers to perform IGA simulations efficiently on parallel computing architectures.

tools.name: igakit
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for NURBS surfaces and volumes in IGA
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating, manipulating, and visualizing NURBS geometries (curves, surfaces, volumes) specifically for Isogeometric Analysis (IGA) workflows.

tools.name: delaunay-fast
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Delaunay Triangulation library in JavaScript

tools.detailed_description: A port of the Computational Geometry Algorithms Library (CGAL) to JavaScript using Emscripten, enabling robust geometric processing and meshing capabilities in web-based scientific tools.

tools.name: mesh_to_sdf

tools.detailed_description: A Python library that calculates signed distance fields (SDF) for arbitrary meshes. It is useful for geometry processing, physics simulations (collision detection), and machine learning applications involving 3D shapes.

tools.name: CGAL_StraightSkeleton_Wrapper

tools.detailed_description: A C# wrapper library that provides access to the straight skeleton calculation functionality of the Computational Geometry Algorithms Library (CGAL). It enables .NET applications to perform complex computational geometry tasks.

tools.name: matcalc
tools.one_line_profile: Library for calculating materials properties from Potential Energy Surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for calculating various material properties based on the Potential Energy Surface (PES). It supports materials science research by providing tools for property estimation.

tools.name: pyhull

tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper around the Qhull library, providing efficient computation of convex hulls, Delaunay triangulations, and Voronoi diagrams. These are fundamental geometric operations for mesh generation and spatial analysis.

tools.name: EasyFEA

tools.name: pyems

tools.name: ugscnn

tools.name: ANNElastoplasticity

tools.name: ccvt

tools.name: TetGen (UFZ Clone)
tools.one_line_profile: Quality tetrahedral mesh generator and 3D Delaunay triangulator
tools.detailed_description: A robust library and program for generating quality tetrahedral meshes and 3D Delaunay triangulations. This repository serves as a mirror/clone of the original TetGen software, widely used in finite element analysis and scientific computing for discretizing 3D domains.

tools.name: kigumi
tools.one_line_profile: Robust boolean operations library for triangle meshes
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed to perform robust boolean operations (union, intersection, difference) on 3D triangle meshes. It is useful for constructive solid geometry (CSG) and mesh processing tasks in engineering and computer graphics.

tools.name: Euclid
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for shape analysis and geometry processing
tools.detailed_description: A header-only C++ library for geometry processing and shape analysis. It provides algorithms for mesh parameterization, curvature estimation, and other geometric computations, serving as a toolkit for researchers and developers in computational geometry.

tools.name: rmcl
tools.one_line_profile: Robot localization in 3D triangle meshes and geometric scene graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library for mobile robot localization that works directly with 3D triangle meshes and geometric scene graphs. It utilizes ray tracing (via Embree or OptiX) to simulate sensor readings and match them against the mesh environment, bridging robotics and geometric simulation.

tools.name: NEATnet
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing and analyzing street geometry
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for processing street network geometry. It provides functionalities to clean, analyze, and manipulate street graph data, useful for urban planning, transportation engineering, and GIS applications.

tools.name: FiniteMesh.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for mesh I/O and connectivity computation
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library focused on reading and writing various finite element mesh formats and computing mesh connectivity information. It serves as a foundational component for finite element analysis workflows in the Julia ecosystem.

tools.name: FEconv
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for finite element mesh and field formats
tools.detailed_description: A utility program to convert between various finite element mesh and field formats, including ANSYS, Nastran, I-Deas, and VTK. It also supports element type transformation (e.g., triangles to tetrahedra, P1 to P2) and bandwidth optimization.

tools.name: umeshu
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight C++ library for 2D unstructured mesh generation
tools.detailed_description: A simple and lightweight C++ library for generating 2D unstructured meshes using Delaunay refinement algorithms. It is designed for integration into larger simulation or geometry processing applications requiring on-the-fly meshing.

tools.name: dicom2fem
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to generate finite element meshes from CT scans (DICOM)
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that converts medical imaging data (DICOM format, specifically CT scans) into finite element meshes. This is essential for bio-mechanical simulations and patient-specific modeling in biomedical engineering.

tools.name: Pixel2Mesh++
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view 3D mesh generation via deformation from images
tools.detailed_description: An AI-based tool (ICCV 2019) that generates high-quality 3D meshes from multi-view images using a deformation-based approach. It is used for 3D reconstruction and geometric modeling tasks.

tools.name: mesh2sdf
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from 3D mesh to Signed Distance Field (SDF)
tools.detailed_description: A utility to compute the Signed Distance Field (SDF) for a given 3D mesh. SDFs are critical in physics simulations (collision detection), rendering, and geometric deep learning.

tools.name: PartCrafter
tools.one_line_profile: Structured 3D mesh generation via compositional latent diffusion
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI tool (NeurIPS 2025) for creating structured 3D meshes using latent diffusion transformers. It allows for high-quality, controllable generation of 3D parts and geometries, useful in design and engineering workflows.

tools.name: PivotMesh
tools.one_line_profile: Generic 3D mesh generation via pivot vertices guidance
tools.detailed_description: An AI model (ICLR 2025) for generating generic 3D meshes guided by pivot vertices. It addresses the challenge of generating topologically consistent and geometrically accurate meshes for various object categories.

tools.name: model-globally-match-locally-python
tools.one_line_profile: Point pair feature matching implementation (Drost-PPF)
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Point Pair Feature (PPF) matching algorithm (Drost-PPF) for 3D object recognition and pose estimation. It includes optional binary extensions for performance, useful in robotics and computer vision.

tools.name: AAGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic machining feature recognition using geometric Attributed Adjacency Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for recognizing machining features from CAD models (B-Rep). It uses a geometric Attributed Adjacency Graph (gAAG) representation to capture topological and geometric attributes, facilitating automated manufacturing planning.

tools.name: Triangle.NET
tools.one_line_profile: C#/.NET port of the Triangle mesh generator
tools.detailed_description: A C# port of Jonathan Shewchuk's famous 'Triangle' library, which generates high-quality 2D meshes and Delaunay triangulations. It brings robust 2D meshing capabilities to the .NET ecosystem.

tools.name: CAD+
tools.one_line_profile: Automation and productivity toolset for SOLIDWORKS
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive plugin/toolset for SOLIDWORKS that automates various engineering tasks, including custom property management, geometry feature automation, and batch operations. It enhances the CAD workflow for mechanical engineers.

tools.name: DelaunayTriangulation
tools.one_line_profile: 3D Delaunay triangulation for spherical point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of Delaunay triangulation in 3D space, specifically optimized for reconstructing convex hulls from spherical point clouds. Useful for geometric reconstruction and surface mesh generation.

tools.name: spherical_voronoi_core
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Voronoi tessellation on a sphere
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library to generate Voronoi tessellations on the surface of a sphere. This is useful for spherical meshing, geospatial analysis, and planetary science simulations.

tools.name: MPM3D-UMAT
tools.one_line_profile: User-defined material models for the MPM3Dpp solver
tools.detailed_description: A collection of C++ user-defined material model subroutines designed for use with the MPM3Dpp material point method solver, enabling simulation of specific material behaviors.

tools.name: dynamic_mascons
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating variable-size mascons using spherical Voronoi tessellations
tools.detailed_description: A development tool for creating 3D global variable-size Mass Concentrations (mascons) using iterative spherical Voronoi tessellations, specifically designed for user-defined areas of interest in geophysics and geodesy.

tools.name: Inv_learning
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for computing viscoelastic constitutive model parameters
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a general deep learning method to solve the inverse problem of computing molecular parameters for viscoelastic constitutive models, aiding in material characterization.

tools.name: trimesh (yig)
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone half-edge mesh data structure library
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library implementing a half-edge data structure for triangular meshes, including a simple OpenGL viewer, with minimal dependencies.

tools.name: CADExchanger (FreeCAD Addon)
tools.one_line_profile: FreeCAD addon for importing and exporting additional CAD formats
tools.detailed_description: An addon for FreeCAD that leverages CAD Exchanger to enable the import and export of various proprietary and standard CAD file formats, enhancing geometry interoperability.

tools.name: cga.js
tools.one_line_profile: 3D computational geometry algorithm library for web
tools.detailed_description: A library providing 3D computational geometry algorithms compatible with WebGL frameworks like three.js and babylon.js, useful for geometric calculations in web-based scientific visualization or modeling.

tools.name: MeshGenerator
tools.one_line_profile: 2D mesh generation script for Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for generating 2D meshes specifically designed for Finite Element Method (FEM) and Virtual Element Method (VEM) simulations.

tools.name: ofxCGAL
tools.one_line_profile: OpenFrameworks addon wrapping CGAL for computational geometry
tools.detailed_description: An addon for openFrameworks that provides an interface to the Computational Geometry Algorithms Library (CGAL), enabling advanced geometric processing capabilities.

tools.name: napari-pymeshlab
tools.one_line_profile: Plugin interfacing napari with PyMeshLab for mesh processing
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that bridges the napari multidimensional image viewer with the PyMeshLab library, allowing users to import, export, and construct surfaces/meshes directly within the viewer.

tools.name: AlignSDF
tools.one_line_profile: Method for pose-aligned signed distance fields reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of AlignSDF, a method for reconstructing hand-object interactions using pose-aligned Signed Distance Fields (SDF), contributing to geometric modeling and reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: meshoptimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Library for optimizing meshes for GPU rendering and processing
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides algorithms for mesh optimization, including vertex cache optimization, overdraw reduction, and mesh simplification, widely used for preparing geometry for efficient rendering and simulation visualization.

tools.name: GraSphInv
tools.one_line_profile: Gravity inversion program with adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: A program for gravity inversion in spherical coordinates that utilizes adaptive inversion mesh refinement and wavelet compression to handle large-scale geophysical data.

tools.name: EIT-Finite-element-mesh
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for dissecting finite element meshes from images for EIT
tools.detailed_description: Code providing a method for fast dissection of finite element meshes based on input pictures, specifically for Electrical Impedance Tomography (EIT) applications.

tools.name: NeuralMeshRefinement
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning method for adaptive mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Neural Mesh Refinement (NMR), a method that learns structural priors to adaptively refine coarse mesh shapes into finer ones based on geometry.

tools.name: matlab-trimesh-stereo-reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Stereo reconstruction tool generating 3D tessellated meshes
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for performing stereo reconstruction to generate 3D tessellated meshes (STL format) from stereo image data.

tools.name: Partition-of-Unity-Isogeometric-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical methods for solving elasticity and fracture mechanics using IGA
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran implementation of Galerkin-based numerical methods, specifically Partition of Unity Isogeometric Analysis, for solving elasticity problems, fourth-order PDEs with cracks, and boundary layer problems.

tools.name: Mesh2Volume
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for converting meshes to signed distance field volumes
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool designed to convert 3D mesh data into Signed Distance Field (SDF) volumes, facilitating geometry processing and implicit surface representation.
